entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Resizetizer 'file is being used by another process' error when referencing a .NET MAUI App from another .NET MAUI App #14082
  • ViewCellRenderer Issues #14079
  • Frame clipping incorrectly on Windows #14078
    Backlog
  • ListView rows not visible on Windows when using CommandParameter #14065
    Backlog
  • [Android and iOS] Keyboard is not dismissed after entering text and tapping Search button in MAUI "SearchBar" control #14061
    Backlog
  • RefreshView TapGestureRecognizer Event does not respond on iOs for items which are only visible after scrolling #14060
  • When using Frame to wrap CollectionView, the bound data is not displayed under certain operations. #14059
    Backlog

Closed

  • RadioButton with ControlTemplate in a Grid can't change from invisible to visible #8482
  • RadioButton crash on Windows #11049
    Backlog
  • Images are lost after receiving push notifications #14064
  • Changing App icon prevents compiler from building successfully #13839
  • LayoutOptions.Fill does not work with VisualElement.MaximumWidthRequest in FlexLayout #14050
  • Border does not grow when editor inside it grows #7524
    Backlog
  • Every MAUI Page generates a Memory Leak on iOS and macCatalyst #13520
    Backlog
  • SearchBar does not unfocus and hide keyboard on iOS #11542
    Backlog
  • Frame Error display on Android devices #13469
    Backlog
  • Text is clipped in SwipeItem #11495
    Backlog
  • Listview Footer content doesn't appears #13560
    Backlog
  • Minimize/Maximize/Close button on the right corner of header of window is not working #8827
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI macOS target publishing/archiving #5399
    Backlog
  • [MAC-CATALYST] Presses methods not triggered for input keys in Entry #9838
    Backlog
  • TableSection TextColor NullReferenceException in Mac #14027
    Backlog
  • Unable to add icon to Tabbed page #13826

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump to .NET 8 Preview 3 builds #14081
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Strong name the build tasks for the IDE #14080
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] [core] WeakEventManager.RemoveEventHandler() should clear subscriptions #14074
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] fix memory leak in `Window` (#13400) #14073
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] Blank image when Source set to null or on image loading error #14071
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] Fix a couple life cycle scenarios on shell modals #14070
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] [Windows] Fixed dupe items in ShellView #14069
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus (#13908) #14067
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event (#11199) #14076
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] Cache the dynamic AppTheme value in Controls (and not Essentials) (#11200) #14072
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] [windows] fix memory leak when `CollectionView.ItemsSource` changes #14075
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event (#11199) #14077
  • [Android] Avoid to clip the SwipeView to the outline if the SwipeView or the Content has shadow #14024
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [controls] fix memory leaks in `Page` & navigation #13833
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [release/7.0.2xx] [net7.0] Cast to a less derived type on TabbedPageManager (#13689) #14068
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Fix iOS ListView Footer Missing (#13560) #13744
    community ✨, area/ListView
  • Bump WASDK and BuildTools #13687
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #14063
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #14047
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix TableSection TextColor null ref exp (#14027) #14055
    community ✨

Updated

  • Set Icon to null and back again, working around Android issue #13267
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Enabling tolerance adjustment in iOS color verification tests #13945
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • Microsoft.Maui.Devices.Flashlight: Check if supported #13703
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Fix next keyboard into a ListView and TableView iOS #13838
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, area/ListView, control-entry
  • Refactor keyboard focus code for .NET 8 #13824
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add AppThemeColor #8839
    community ✨, area/theme
  • Implement Entry IsSpellCheckEnabled property #7442
    t/breaking 💥, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, .NET 8 Planning
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Use a layout for MauiButton on Windows which supports LineBreakMode #14036
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲
  • Invalidate shapes changing any property inside the brushes (Fill, Stroke) #13905
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix memory leak in VisualElement.Shadow #13960
    t/bug, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Windows] Fix Shadow positions issues #13959
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
  • Run templates on Android and iOS #13662
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • Correctly propagate BindingContext to Border StrokeShape #13793
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Fixed SwipeItems size dynamically changing the Content Margin #13501
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Essentials] Remove Task.Run from SecureStorage #13940
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Android] Fix issue calculating the threshold using SwipeItemViews #13615
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix controls RTL issues #13672
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Implement SearchBar CancelButtonColor on Windows #13622
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Allow SearchBar to take full width on Android #13716
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
